<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/truncatedblake3">TruncatedBLAKE3&lt;NumBytes&gt;</a></>}>
Like <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3">BLAKE3</a></code> but using a class-level template parameter for specifying the hash size of the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/truncatedblake3/#a74a099d51430f54417d27af6f552d183">final()</a></code> and <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/truncatedblake3/#adda4f5df8b748e9f3c27dc9872b52330">result()</a></code> functions. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/truncatedblake3/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The constant \\p LLVM&#95;BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN provides the default output length,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 32 bytes, which is recommended for most callers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Outputs shorter than the default length of 32 bytes (256 bits) provide</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// less security. An N-bit BLAKE3 output is intended to provide N bits of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// first and second preimage resistance and N/2 bits of collision</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// resistance, for any N up to 256 Longer outputs don&#39;t provide any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// additional security.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Shorter BLAKE3 outputs are prefixes of longer ones. Explicitly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// requesting a short output is equivalent to truncating the default-length</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// output.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumBytes = LLVM&#95;BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a081d38a75bd71be1f6b2db493b46c70e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a081d38a75bd71be1f6b2db493b46c70e">BLAKE3Result</a> = std::array&lt;uint8&#95;t, NumBytes&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A class that wraps the BLAKE3 algorithm.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This doesn&#39;t modify the hasher itself, and it&#39;s possible to finalize again</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// after adding more input.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/truncatedblake3/#a74a099d51430f54417d27af6f552d183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a081d38a75bd71be1f6b2db493b46c70e">BLAKE3Result&lt;NumBytes&gt;</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">final</span><span class="doxyHighlight">() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3/#a1d9661e1a088c345ba2868f46caaf460">BLAKE3::final&lt;NumBytes&gt;</a>(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the current output for the digested data since the last call to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// init().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Other hash functions distinguish between \\p result() and \\p final(), with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p result() allowing more calls into \\p update(), but there&#39;s no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// difference for the BLAKE3 hash function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/truncatedblake3/#adda4f5df8b748e9f3c27dc9872b52330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a081d38a75bd71be1f6b2db493b46c70e">BLAKE3Result&lt;NumBytes&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/truncatedblake3/#adda4f5df8b748e9f3c27dc9872b52330">result</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3/#ab6da7d121372343d7fced230ad454f18">BLAKE3::result&lt;NumBytes&gt;</a>(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
